discord_integration/discord_already_pend: You already have a pending verification.
discord_integration/discord_bot_check_lo: You should check for a more specific error (if one exists) in StaffCP -> Security -> All Logs.
discord_integration/discord_bot_error_in: Provided Guild ID is invalid, or the bot is not in it.
Provided User ID is invalid, or is not in specified Guild.
discord_integration/discord_bot_error_no: The bot is not linked to this website for provided Guild ID.
discord_integration/discord_bot_error_pa: The bot could not edit one or more of the roles due to a Discord hierarchy misconfiguration.
discord_integration/discord_bot_must_be_: Cannot enable Discord Integration until you have set up the bot. For information, please {{linkStart}}click here{{linkEnd}}.
discord_integration/discord_communicatio: There was an error while communicating with the Discord Bot. Please ensure the bot is running and your Bot URL is correct.
discord_integration/discord_database_err: The Nameless Link database is currently down. Please try again later.
discord_integration/discord_id_confirm: Please run the command "/verify {{token}}" in Discord to finish linking your Discord account.
discord_integration/discord_id_help: For information on where to find Discord IDs, please read {{linkStart}}this.{{linkEnd}}
discord_integration/discord_id_length: Please ensure your Discord ID is 18 characters long.
discord_integration/discord_id_numeric: Please ensure your Discord ID is numeric (Numbers only).
discord_integration/discord_id_taken: That Discord User ID has already been taken.
discord_integration/discord_id_unlinked: Successfully unlinked your Discord User ID.
discord_integration/discord_integration_: Discord integration is not set up
discord_integration/discord_invalid_id: That Discord User ID is invalid.
discord_integration/discord_invite_info: To invite the Nameless Link bot to your Discord server, click {{inviteLinkStart}}here{{inviteLinkEnd}}. Then, run the /apiurl command to link the bot with your website. Alternatively, you can {{selfHostLinkStart}}host the bot yourself{{selfHostLinkEnd}}.
discord_integration/discord_role_id_leng: Discord Role ID must be 18 digits long.
discord_integration/discord_role_id_nume: Discord Role ID must be numeric.
discord_integration/discord_unknown_erro: There was an unknown error while syncing Discord roles. Please contact an administrator.
discord_integration/discord_widget_disab: The widget is disabled for the specified Discord server. Please go to the 'Widget' tab in your Discord server settings, and ensure the Discord widget is enabled and that the ID is correct.
discord_integration/no_pending_verificat: There are no verifications pending under the supplied token.
discord_integration/provide_one_discord_: Please provide at least one of the following: "url", "guild_id"
discord_integration/unable_to_set_discor: Unable to set Discord bot URL
discord_integration/unable_to_update_dis: Unable to update Discord bot username.
Unable to update Discord roles list.
